meanings: be shut up (in), be locked (up/away), be confined

vlive.korean: 이제 그 사막 세트에서 액자에 제가 이렇게 갇힌 느낌에... In the desert, it looks like I was locked in a frame. 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: In the desert, it looks like I was locked in a frame.

vlive.korean: [아직 못 나오고 갇힌 유나의 캡슐들] - 유닛을 봐볼까요? - 근데 이게... [YUNA's capsules are locked in] - Let's look at the unit. - But this... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “우당탕탕 ITZY의 유닛뽑기” (있지 : ITZY)
vlive.english: [YUNA's capsules are locked in] - Let's look at the unit. - But this...

vlive.korean: 이름이라는 편견에 내가 갇힌 느낌? Feels like it's trapped within the bias of its name? 듣기 View video HANABONO : 찬바람 불때 추천하고 싶은 보습 🍯꿀템 토너, 크림, 바디 등 다양하다 다양해!!
vlive.english: Feels like it's trapped within the bias of its name?

vlive.korean: [저게 뭐야] [정원에 갇힌 다람쥐 부활?] 다람쥐 아니에요? [What's this?] [A squirrel?] Isn't it a squirrel? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.49
vlive.english: [What's this?] [A squirrel?] Isn't it a squirrel?

vlive.korean: 들으면 약간 나 혼자만의 공간에 갇힌 기분이 나. When I listen to it, I feel like I'm locked in my own space. 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 오사카 밤밤밤에~💫
vlive.english: When I listen to it, I feel like I'm locked in my own space.

examples.korean: He paced the room like a caged animal. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 우리 안에 갇힌 짐승처럼 방안을 왔다갔다 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He paced the room like a caged animal. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Rescuers worked in relays to save the trapped miners. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 갇힌 광부들을 구출하기 위해 구조원들이 교대를 해 가며 작업을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Rescuers worked in relays to save the trapped miners. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Time is running out for the trapped miners. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 갱에 갇힌 광부들에게는 (생존할 수 있는) 시간이 얼마 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Time is running out for the trapped miners. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Firefighters had to break the door down to reach the people trapped inside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 안에 갇힌 사람들에게 접근하기 위해 소방관들이 문을 부수어야만 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Firefighters had to break the door down to reach the people trapped inside. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She is afraid to go out and has become a virtual prisoner in her own home. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 외출을 두려워하며 사실상 자기 집에 갇힌 포로가 되어 버렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She is afraid to go out and has become a virtual prisoner in her own home. Add to Wordbook
